Title: Relates to establishing a secure website and mobile application to allow voters to view the status of their absentee ballots
Summary: Relates to establishing a secure website and mobile application that allows voters who have submitted an application for an absentee ballot to view the current status of their application and absentee ballot.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to establishing a website and mobile application that allows voters to view the status of their absentee ballot applications and absentee ballots
